title: Steven Gluckstern, Who Pushed for Mortgage Relief, Dies at 71
description: A financial executive and sometime sports entrepreneur, he was thwarted in his quixotic quest to help homeowners with underwater mortgages during the Great Recession.
dc:creator: Richard Sandomir
category: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
media:credit: Michael Falco for The New York Times
media:description: Steven Gluckstern with his wife, Judy, in 2009. His ambitious plan to provide financial relief to homeowners ultimately failed.
